boardgame.name: Campionato Italiano
Demarrage
Demarraje
Homas Tour
Peleton
Peloton
Um Reifenbreite
boardgame.description: Translating as _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;By the Width of a Tire,_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; this game covers a Tour de France-type of bicycle race. Each player takes control of a four-member racing team, and the goal is to score as many points as possible for the whole team. Movement is primarily handled by dice, however a limited card set partially replaces die results. Once you add unique rules which allow riders to draft one another and multiple kinds of road surfaces, this game has much to offer race fans._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Homas Tour is the original edition of the cycle racing game later known as Um Reifenbreite. Many copies of the original game were destroyed in a warehouse fire in 1979. The combination of its sudden rarity and recognition as a good game meant that Homas Tour was (and is) very desirable, particularly to collectors. Everyone else can save their money and enjoy Um Reifenbreite!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;
boardgame.boardgamehonor: 1992 Deutscher Spiele Preis Best Family/Adult Game 2nd Place

All games come from a private collection (non-smoking environment)! Please contact me if you´re looking for more interesting German games as I can offer a lot more. Buyer pays postage, so ask before buying to determine the weight of your desired games! The following payments are welcome: (1) Cash in a registered letter (only Euro accepted) or (2) Chargefree EU Bank-Transfer (using IBAN and SWIFT) or (3) Moneybookers.com (it´s as fast and safe as PayPal but much cheaper: maximum fee is 0.50 EUR) or (4) PayPal (for PayPal payment please add +5 % of the total sum). Have fun playing, Flix! --------------------------------------------- NEW SHIPPING CONDITIONS TO US! Brand new still in shrink wrap Jumbo edition. This is a German language edition. I accept PayPal transfers. I don_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t accept PayPal credit card payments. For international orders PayPal transfers (not credit cards) are strongly preferred but I will accept checks in USD drawn on a US bank. There may be additional shipping delays for international orders paid by check as I wait for the check to clear. Buyer pays actual shipping charges for US addresses. International orders will incur a $2 handling fee. I will ship game within 1 business day of receiving payment, unless payment is by personal check. Personal checks will delay shipping by upto 7-10 business days after check arrives. I will combine shipping on multiple orders to lower overall shipping charges.
